meanings.definition: A side of a hill or mountain that is exposed to the sun and therefore drier and warmer.
meanings.sent1: The hikers enjoyed the warmth on the burnside of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The burnside of the hill was perfect for a picnic in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The burnside of the hill was like a cozy sunbathing spot.
meanings.sent4: The burnside of the mountain embraced the sunlight like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The burnside of the hill beckoned with its sunny charm.
